author: Shaun Lintern, Shaun Lintern
title: Science breakthroughs and risks in the race to bring the world a coronavirus vaccine
description: There are 86 projects across the globe trying to find a solution to the Covid-19 crisis. But, experts tell health correspondent Shaun Lintern, there are challenges ahead – and safety concerns to be addressed
content:
With countries across the planet grappling with lockdowns, its clear that theres only one way to return to life as we knew it. As Sir Patrick Vallance, the UKs chief scientific adviser, put it this week, vaccines are the way out of this global crisis.
There … [+14503 chars]
